summary.span: 提供與目前應用程式相關的屬性、方法和事件。

span.span: Provides properties, methods, and events related to the current application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所公開的屬性`My.Application`物件只與目前的應用程式或 DLL 相關聯的傳回資料。The properties exposed by the `My.Application` object return data that is associated only with the current application or DLL. 使用 `My.Application` 無法改變任何系統層級資訊。No system-level information can be altered with `My.Application`. `My.Application` 物件包含下列類別：The `My.Application` object consists of the following classes: - 提供適用於所有專案的成員。 provides members that are available in all projects. - 提供可用在 Windows Form 應用程式中的成員。 provides members that are available in Windows Forms applications. - 提供主控台應用程式中可用的成員。 provides members that are available in console applications. ## Examples 這個範例會使用迴圈，逐一查看的應用程式開啟表單，會選取目前的執行緒，可以直接存取的表單並顯示在其標題控制項。This example uses a loop to iterate through the application's open forms, selects the forms that can be accessed directly by the current thread, and displays their titles in a control. 如需如何存取已開啟表單的資訊，請參閱。For information about how to access the open forms, see . [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplication#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplication/VB/Form1.vb#10)] 這個範例需要您的 Windows Form 應用程式具有名為表單`Form1`，其中包含名為清單方塊`ListBox1`。This example requires that your Windows Forms application have a form named `Form1` that contains a list box named `ListBox1`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public instance void DoEvents() cil managed

summary.span: 處理目前在訊息佇列中的所有 Windows 訊息。

span.span: Processes all Windows messages currently in the message queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Application.DoEvents`方法可讓您的應用程式來處理您的程式碼執行時所引發的其他事件。The `My.Application.DoEvents` method allows your application to handle other events that might be raised while you code runs. `My.Application.DoEvents`方法具有相同的行為方法。The `My.Application.DoEvents` method has the same behavior as the method. 當您執行的 Windows Form 應用程式時，它會建立新的表單，然後等候處理的事件。When you run a Windows Forms application, it creates a new form, which then waits for events to be handled. 每次表單處理事件，例如按一下按鈕，它會處理與該事件相關聯的所有程式碼。Each time the form handles an event, such as a button click, it processes all the code associated with that event. 在佇列中等候所有其他事件。All other events wait in the queue. 當您的程式碼處理事件時，您的應用程式沒有回應。While your code handles the event, your application does not respond. 例如，視窗不會重新繪製如果拖曳至另一個視窗頂端。For example, the window does not repaint if another window is dragged on top. 如果您呼叫`My.Application.DoEvents`程式碼，在您的應用程式可以處理其他事件。If you call `My.Application.DoEvents` in your code, your application can handle the other events. 例如，如果您的程式碼將資料加入至在迴圈中，並在它會呼叫的迴圈的每個步驟之後`My.Application.DoEvents`，透過它拖曳至另一個視窗時，會重新繪製您的表單。For example, if your code adds data to a in a loop, and after each step of the loop it calls `My.Application.DoEvents`, your form repaints when another window is dragged over it. 如果您移除`My.Application.DoEvents`從程式碼中，您的表單將不重新繪製按鈕的 click 事件處理常式完成之前執行。If you remove `My.Application.DoEvents` from your code, your form will not repaint until the click event handler of the button is finished executing. 一般而言，您可以使用這個方法來處理訊息迴圈中。Typically, you use this method in a loop to process messages. > [!NOTE] > `My.Application.DoEvents`方法不會處理事件中完全相同的方式與表單。The `My.Application.DoEvents` method does not process events in exactly the same way as the form does. 使用多執行緒進行直接處理事件的形式。Use multithreading to make the form directly handle the events. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[多執行緒應用程式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a06a1a56-dd16-44e8-bc01-2c2255511bc6)。For more information, see [Multithreaded Applications](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a06a1a56-dd16-44e8-bc01-2c2255511bc6). > [!CAUTION] > 如果處理的使用者介面 (UI) 事件的方法會呼叫`My.Application.DoEvents`方法，此方法可能是重新輸入之前完成。If a method that handles a user interface (UI) event calls the `My.Application.DoEvents` method, the method might be re-entered before it finishes. 這可能是因為`My.Application.DoEvents`方法處理 Windows 訊息和 Windows 訊息可以引發事件。This can happen because the `My.Application.DoEvents` method processes Windows messages, and Windows messages can raise events. 下表列出的工作，包含範例`My.Application.DoEvents`方法。The following table lists an example of a task involving the `My.Application.DoEvents` method. |以To|請參閱See| |-|-| |讓表單 ui 輸入忙碌時回應Allow a form to respond to UI input while busy|[逐步解說：處理事件Walkthrough: Handling Events](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/events/walkthrough-handling-events.md)| ## 專案類型的可用性Availability by Project Type |專案類型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows Forms 應用程式Windows Forms Application|**是****Yes**| |類別庫Class Library|否No| |主控台應用程式Console Application|否No| |Windows Form 控制項程式庫Windows Forms Control Library|否No| |Web 控制項程式庫Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服務Windows Service|否No| |網站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 這個範例會使用`My.Application.DoEvents`方法，以允許的 UI`TextBox1`更新。This example uses the `My.Application.DoEvents` method to allow the UI for `TextBox1` to update. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplication#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplication/VB/Form1.vb#6)] 此程式碼應為具有`TextBox1`元件`Text`屬性。This code should be in a form that has a `TextBox1` component with a `Text` property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用`MainForm`屬性來取得或設定Visual Basic 應用程式啟動/關機模型用做應用程式的主要表單的物件。Use the `MainForm` property to get or set the object that the Visual Basic Application Startup/Shutdown model uses as the application's main form. 此屬性支援 Visual Basic 應用程式啟動/關機模型。This property supports the Visual Basic Application Startup/Shutdown model. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Visual Basic 應用程式模型概觀](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md)。For more information, see [Overview of the Visual Basic Application Model](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md). 應用程式關閉時，不會保存此屬性的變更。The changes to this property are not persisted when the application closes. 若要永久變更，主要表單，您必須變更中的設定**專案設計工具**。To change the main form permanently, you must change the setting in the **Project Designer**.

summary.span: 判斷啟動顯示畫面的最小顯示時間長度 (以毫秒為單位)。

span.span: Determines the minimum length of time, in milliseconds, for which the splash screen is displayed.

value.span: 啟動顯示畫面的最小顯示時間長度 (以毫秒為單位)。

span.span: The minimum length of time, in milliseconds, for which the splash screen is displayed.

remarks.format:
## Remarks `My.Application.MinimumSplashScreenDisplayTime`屬性可讓您指定您想要顯示的應用程式的啟動顯示畫面時間的最小長度。The `My.Application.MinimumSplashScreenDisplayTime` property allows you to specify the minimum length of time you want the application's splash screen to be displayed. 如果主要表單完成初始設定的較少的時間比這個屬性所指定的內容，啟動顯示畫面會一直要求的時間為止，此時會顯示主要表單的數量。If the main form finishes initializing in less time than what is specified by this property, the splash screen remains until the requested amount of time passes, at which time the main form is displayed. 如果您的應用程式需要較長的時間啟動，啟動顯示畫面已關閉，一旦主要表單變為作用中。If your application takes longer to start, the splash screen is closed once the main form becomes active. 當您使用 專案設計工具的應用程式加入啟動顯示畫面時，它會設定`My.Application.MinimumSplashScreenDisplayTime`屬性為 2000，讓兩秒的最小的顯示時間。When you add a splash screen to your application using the Project Designer, it sets the `My.Application.MinimumSplashScreenDisplayTime` property to 2000, giving a minimum display time of two seconds. 此屬性支援 Visual Basic 應用程式模型。This property supports the Visual Basic Application model. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Visual Basic 應用程式模型概觀](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md)。For more information, see [Overview of the Visual Basic Application Model](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md). 您應該設定`My.Application.MinimumSplashScreenDisplayTime`屬性會覆寫方法中的或方法。You should set the `My.Application.MinimumSplashScreenDisplayTime` property in a method that overrides the or method. 覆寫方法的程式碼類別應該進入預設隱藏的 ApplicationEvents.vb 檔案。Code that overrides methods of the class should be entered in the ApplicationEvents.vb file, which is hidden by default. | | |-| |若要存取程式碼編輯器視窗，覆寫成員To access the Code Editor window for overriding members| |1.在選取的專案**方案總管] 中**，按一下 [**屬性**上**專案**功能表。1. With a project selected in **Solution Explorer**, click **Properties** on the **Project** menu.
2.按一下 [應用程式] 索引標籤。2. Click the **Application** tab.
3.按一下 [檢視應用程式事件] 按鈕以開啟 [程式碼編輯器]。3. Click the **View Application Events** button to open the Code Editor.

如需詳細資訊，請參閱[專案設計工具、應用程式頁 (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic)。For more information, see [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic).| ## 專案類型的可用性Availability by Project Type |專案類型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows Forms 應用程式Windows Forms Application|**是****Yes**| |類別庫Class Library|否No| |主控台應用程式Console Application|否No| |Windows Form 控制項程式庫Windows Forms Control Library|否No| |Web 控制項程式庫Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服務Windows Service|否No| |網站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 這個範例示範如何設定`My.Application.MinimumSplashScreenDisplayTime`藉由覆寫屬性屬性。This example demonstrates how to set the `My.Application.MinimumSplashScreenDisplayTime` property by overriding the property. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplication#51](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplication/VB/FakeMyEvents.vb#51)] 這個範例需要專案有啟動顯示畫面。This example requires that the project have a splash screen. 針對應用程式事件，您必須在程式碼編輯器 視窗中輸入此程式碼。You must enter this code in the Code Editor window for application events. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[專案設計工具、應用程式頁 (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic)。For more information, see [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event NetworkAvailabilityChanged As NetworkAvailableEventHandler

summary.span: 當網路可用性變更時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the network availability changes.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 應用程式引發`NetworkAvailabilityChanged`事件每次變更網路的可用性。An application raises the `NetworkAvailabilityChanged` event every time that the availability of the network changes. 您可以使用屬性`e`參數，以取得新的網路連線狀態。You can use the property of the `e` parameter to get the new state of the network connection. 若要取得的網路連線的目前狀態，請使用屬性。To get the current state of the network connection, use the property. 與其他使用者介面事件的應用程式的主執行緒上，會引發這個事件。This event is raised on the application's main thread with the other user-interface events. 這可讓事件處理常式，以直接存取應用程式的 UI。This enables the event handler to access directly the application's UI. 不過，如果應用程式忙碌處理另一個使用者介面事件時都會引發這個事件，此事件無法處理直到完成其他事件處理常式，或呼叫方法。However, if the application is busy handling another user-interface event when this event is raised, this event cannot be processed until the other event handler finishes or calls the method. 事件提供相同的功能，因為此事件但為適用於所有應用程式類型。The event provides the same functionality as this event but is available for all application types. 程式碼`NetworkAvailabilityChanged`事件處理常式會儲存在 ApplicationEvents.vb 檔案中，預設為隱藏。The code for the `NetworkAvailabilityChanged` event handler is stored in the ApplicationEvents.vb file, which is hidden by default. | | |-| |若要存取的應用程式事件的程式碼編輯器視窗To access the Code Editor window for application events| |1.在中選取專案**方案總管 中。**1. Have a project selected in **Solution Explorer.** 按一下**屬性**上**專案**功能表。Click **Properties** on the **Project** menu.
2.按一下 [應用程式] 索引標籤。2. Click the **Application** tab.
3.按一下 [檢視應用程式事件] 按鈕以開啟 [程式碼編輯器]。3. Click the **View Application Events** button to open the Code Editor.

如需詳細資訊，請參閱[專案設計工具、應用程式頁 (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic)。For more information, see [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic).| > [!NOTE] > 許多網路集線器會提供網路連線，即使較大的網路連線中斷的中樞。Many network hubs will provide a network connection even if the hub is disconnected from a larger network. 因此，對於有線連線，此事件表示變更電腦與中心之間的連線。Consequently, for wired connections, this event indicates change in the connection between the computer and a hub. > [!NOTE] > `NetworkAvailabilityChanged` Windows 95 及 Windows 98 上執行時，或由非系統管理員在 Windows 2000 上執行時，由應用程式不引發事件。The `NetworkAvailabilityChanged` event is not raised by applications when they are run on Windows 95 and Windows 98, or when they are run by a non-administrator on Windows 2000. 如果您的應用程式可能會執行這些作業系統上，使用屬性來檢查網路可用性。If your application might run on those operating systems, use the property to check for network availability. ## 專案類型的可用性Availability by Project Type |專案類型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows Forms 應用程式Windows Forms Application|**是****Yes**| |類別庫Class Library|否No| |主控台應用程式Console Application|否No| |Windows Form 控制項程式庫Windows Forms Control Library|否No| |Web 控制項程式庫Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服務Windows Service|否No| |網站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 這個範例會呼叫`SetConnectionStatus`方法的預設`Form1`類別網路的可用性變更時發生。This example calls the `SetConnectionStatus` method of the default `Form1` class when the network availability changes. 您必須在應用程式事件的程式碼編輯器 視窗中輸入程式碼。You must enter the code in the Code Editor window for application events. 若要存取此視窗，請遵循本主題的 < 備註 > 一節的指示。To access this window, follow the instructions from this topic's Remarks section. 專案應該具有名為表單`Form1`。The project should have a form named `Form1`. 則不能有一個名為方法`SetConnectionStatus`採用`Boolean`參數。It should have a method named `SetConnectionStatus` that takes a `Boolean` parameter. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplication#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplication/VB/FakeMyEvents.vb#9)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，這個方法沒有任何作用。By default, this method does nothing. 不過，當您選取主要表單在 Visual Basic 中的應用程式**專案設計工具**，設計工具會覆寫此方法時，設定方法主要表單的新執行個體的屬性。However, when you select a main form for your application in the Visual Basic **Project Designer**, the designer overrides this method with a method that sets the property to a new instance of the main form. 這個方法會呼叫方法。This method is called by the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設之前它進入 Windows Form 訊息迴圈中，, 這個方法會呼叫`OnCreateMainForm`（要建立應用程式的主要表單） 和`HideSplashScreen`（若要關閉啟動顯示畫面） 方法：By default, before it enters the Windows Forms message loop, this method calls the `OnCreateMainForm` (to create the application's main form) and `HideSplashScreen` (to close the splash screen) methods: - 。. 提供方法，讓設計工具發出初始化主要表單的程式碼。Provides a way for a designer to emit code that initializes the main form. 根據預設，這個方法沒有任何作用。By default, this method does nothing. 不過，當您選取主要表單在 Visual Basic 中的應用程式**專案設計工具**，設計工具會覆寫方法設定的方法與主要表單的新執行個體的屬性。However, when you select a main form for your application in the Visual Basic **Project Designer**, the designer overrides the method with a method that sets the property to a new instance of the main form. - 。. 如果應用程式具有定義的啟動顯示畫面，而其為開啟，這個方法會關閉在啟動顯示畫面。If the application has a splash screen defined and it is open, this method closes the splash screen. 根據預設，這個方法會關閉在啟動顯示畫面。By default, this method closes the splash screen.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Application.OpenForms`屬性會取得之應用程式的所有開啟表單的集合。The `My.Application.OpenForms` property gets a collection of all the application's open forms. 行為等同於屬性。The behavior is identical to the property. > [!NOTE] > `My.Application.OpenForms`屬性會傳回所有開啟表單中，不論哪一個執行緒的開啟它們。The `My.Application.OpenForms` property returns all open forms, regardless of which thread opened them. 您應該檢查屬性的每個表單之前存取它; 否則它可能會擲回例外狀況。You should check the property of each form before accessing it; otherwise, it might throw an exception. ## 專案類型的可用性Availability by Project Type |專案類型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows Forms 應用程式Windows Forms Application|**是****Yes**| |類別庫Class Library|否No| |主控台應用程式Console Application|否No| |Windows Form 控制項程式庫Windows Forms Control Library|否No| |Web 控制項程式庫Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服務Windows Service|否No| |網站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 此範例中循環查看應用程式之開啟表單，選取直接存取目前的執行緒，並顯示在其標題控制項。This example loops over the application's open forms, selects the ones directly accessible by the current thread, and displays their titles in a control. 這個範例需要您的 Windows Form 應用程式具有名為表單`Form1`，其中包含名為清單方塊`ListBox1`。This example requires that your Windows Forms application have a form named `Form1` that contains a list box named `ListBox1`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplication#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplication/VB/Form1.vb#10)] 這個範例會循環查看應用程式之開啟表單，並顯示其標題中的控制項。This example loops over the application's open forms and displays their titles in a control. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplication#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplication/VB/Form1.vb#11)]

summary.span: 判斷應用程式是否在結束時儲存使用者設定。

span.span: Determines whether the application saves the user settings on exit.

value.span: 表示應用程式會在結束時儲存使用者設定。

span.span: indicates that the application saves the user settings on exit.

value.span: 否則，不會隱含地儲存設定。

span.span: Otherwise, the settings are not implicitly saved.

remarks.format:
## Remarks `SaveMySettingsOnExit`屬性可讓使用者變更應用程式在執行階段所儲存的設定。The `SaveMySettingsOnExit` property allows the user to change how the application saves settings, at run time. 您可以使用，以明確地儲存設定變更方法`My.Settings`物件。You can explicitly save setting changes by using the method of the `My.Settings` object. 如需有關變更並儲存設定的詳細資訊，請參閱[應用程式屬性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0ad4926f-636e-41f8-a5b1-faf9d9b0a254)。For more information about changing and saving settings, see [Application Properties](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0ad4926f-636e-41f8-a5b1-faf9d9b0a254). 應用程式關閉時，不會保存此屬性的變更。The changes to this property are not persisted when the application closes. 若要變更`SaveMySettingsOnExit`屬性永久，您必須變更設定中的**專案設計工具**:To change the `SaveMySettingsOnExit` property permanently, you must change the setting in the **Project Designer**: | | |-| |若要變更 專案設計工具中的設定To change the setting in the Project Designer| |1.在 **方案總管**中選取專案。1. Have a project selected in **Solution Explorer**. 按一下**屬性**上**專案**功能表。Click **Properties** on the **Project** menu.
2.按一下 [應用程式] 索引標籤。2. Click the **Application** tab.
3.選取**在關閉儲存 My.Settings**。3. Select **Save My.Settings on Shutdown**.| ## 專案類型的可用性Availability by Project Type |專案類型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows Forms 應用程式Windows Forms Application|**是****Yes**| |類別庫Class Library|否No| |主控台應用程式Console Application|否No| |Windows Form 控制項程式庫Windows Forms Control Library|否No| |Web 控制項程式庫Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服務Windows Service|否No| |網站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 這個範例有兩個部分。This example has two parts. - `InitializeSaveMySettingsOnExit`初始化的核取的狀態的副程式控制項的目前值`SaveMySettingsOnExit`屬性。The `InitializeSaveMySettingsOnExit` subroutine, which initializes the checked state of a control to the current value of the `SaveMySettingsOnExit` property. - `SaveMySettingsOnExit_CheckedChanged`副程式，用來處理變更控制項更新`My.Application.SaveMySettingsOnExit`屬性。The `SaveMySettingsOnExit_CheckedChanged` subroutine, which handles changes to a control to update the `My.Application.SaveMySettingsOnExit` property. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplication#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplication/VB/Form1.vb#12)] 要讓範例能夠運作，您的應用程式必須有控制項，名為`SaveMySettingsOnExit`。For this example to work, your application must have a control named `SaveMySettingsOnExit`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，這個方法會呼叫`OnCreateSplashScreen`執行緒安全的方式。By default, this method calls `OnCreateSplashScreen` in a thread-safe way. 方法包含的程式碼會顯示啟動顯示畫面上的最小的所指定的毫秒數屬性。The method contains the code that displays the splash screen for at least the number of milliseconds specified by the property. 若要使用這項功能，您必須設定`My.Application.MinimumSplashScreenDisplayTime`屬性會覆寫方法中的或方法，或新增到您的應用程式使用的啟動顯示畫面**專案設計工具**。To use this functionality, you must set the `My.Application.MinimumSplashScreenDisplayTime` property in a method that overrides the or method, or add the splash screen to your application using the **Project Designer**. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . 這個方法會呼叫方法。This method is called by the method.

summary.span: 發生於應用程式關閉時。

span.span: Occurs when the application shuts down.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 應用程式引發`Shutdown`結束前的事件。An application raises the `Shutdown` event before it exits. 這可讓您控制如何在應用程式關閉其資源。This allows you to control how the application closes its resources. 此事件是在 Visual Basic 應用程式模型的一部分。This event is part of the Visual Basic Application model. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Visual Basic 應用程式模型概觀](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md)。For more information, see [Overview of the Visual Basic Application Model](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md). 程式碼`Shutdown`事件處理常式會儲存在 ApplicationEvents.vb 檔案中，預設為隱藏。The code for the `Shutdown` event handler is stored in the ApplicationEvents.vb file, which is hidden by default. | | |-| |若要存取的應用程式事件的程式碼編輯器視窗To access the Code Editor window for application events| |1.在選取的專案**方案總管] 中**，按一下 [**屬性**上**專案**功能表。1. With a project selected in **Solution Explorer**, click **Properties** on the **Project** menu.
2.按一下 [應用程式] 索引標籤。2. Click the **Application** tab.
3.按一下 [檢視應用程式事件] 按鈕以開啟 [程式碼編輯器]。3. Click the **View Application Events** button to open the Code Editor.

如需詳細資訊，請參閱[專案設計工具、應用程式頁 (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic)。For more information, see [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic).| ## 專案類型的可用性Availability by Project Type |專案類型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows Forms 應用程式Windows Forms Application|**是****Yes**| |類別庫Class Library|否No| |主控台應用程式Console Application|否No| |Windows Form 控制項程式庫Windows Forms Control Library|否No| |Web 控制項程式庫Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服務Windows Service|否No| |網站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 應用程式關閉時，此範例中會記錄訊息。This example logs messages when the application shuts down. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplication#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplication/VB/FakeMyEvents.vb#13)] 您必須在應用程式事件的程式碼編輯器 視窗中輸入程式碼。You must enter the code in the Code Editor window for application events. 若要存取此視窗，請遵循本主題的 < 備註 > 一節的指示。To access this window, follow the instructions from this topic's Remarks section. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 記錄訊息時應用程式啟動或關閉向下](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/how-to-log-messages-when-the-application-starts-or-shuts-down.md)。For more information, see [How to: Log Messages When the Application Starts or Shuts Down](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/how-to-log-messages-when-the-application-starts-or-shuts-down.md).

value.span: 物件，應用程式將其用做啟動顯示畫面。

span.span: A object that the application uses as the splash screen.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Application.SplashScreen`屬性可讓您取得或設定應用程式當做啟動顯示畫面使用的物件、 應用程式正在啟動時，會顯示第一個圖形形式。The `My.Application.SplashScreen` property allows you to get or set the object that the application uses as the splash screen, the first graphic form that is displayed while an application is being started. 此屬性支援 Visual Basic 應用程式模型。This property supports the Visual Basic Application model. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Visual Basic 應用程式模型概觀](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md)。For more information, see [Overview of the Visual Basic Application Model](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md). 應用程式關閉時，不會保存此屬性的變更。The changes to this property are not persisted when the application closes. 若要永久變更啟動顯示畫面，您必須變更中的設定**專案設計工具**。To change the splash screen permanently, you must change the setting in the **Project Designer**. ## 專案類型的可用性Availability by Project Type |專案類型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows Forms 應用程式Windows Forms Application|**是****Yes**| |類別庫Class Library|否No| |主控台應用程式Console Application|否No| |Windows Form 控制項程式庫Windows Forms Control Library|否No| |Web 控制項程式庫Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服務Windows Service|否No| |網站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 這個範例會使用`My.Application.SplashScreen`屬性和`My.Application.Startup`應用程式啟動時，更新啟動顯示畫面的狀態資訊的事件。This example uses the `My.Application.SplashScreen` property and the `My.Application.Startup` event to update the splash screen with status information as the application starts. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplication#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplication/VB/FakeMyEvents.vb#14)] 這個範例需要名為啟動顯示畫面必須專案`SplashScreen1`。This example requires that the project have a splash screen named `SplashScreen1`. 啟動顯示畫面必須有一個名為屬性`Status`，更新其使用者介面。The splash screen needs to have a property named `Status` that updates its user interface. 針對應用程式事件，您必須在程式碼編輯器 視窗中輸入此程式碼。You must enter this code in the Code Editor window for application events. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[專案設計工具、應用程式頁 (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic)。For more information, see [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic).

exception.span: 系統會將相同的值指派給這個屬性和 屬性。

span.span: The same value is assigned to this property and the property.

summary.span: 發生於應用程式啟動時。

span.span: Occurs when the application starts.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 一般 （非單一的執行個體） 應用程式引發`Startup`每次啟動的事件。A normal (non-single-instance) application raises the `Startup` event every time it starts. 單一執行個體的應用程式引發`Startup`事件時啟動僅如果應用程式尚未使用中; 否則便會產生`StartupNextInstance`事件。A single-instance application raises the `Startup` event when it starts only if the application is not already active; otherwise, it raises the `StartupNextInstance` event. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . 此事件是在 Visual Basic 應用程式模型的一部分。This event is part of the Visual Basic Application model. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Visual Basic 應用程式模型概觀](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md)。For more information, see [Overview of the Visual Basic Application Model](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md). 您可以使用屬性`e`參數來控制應用程式的啟動表單的載入。You can use the property of the `e` parameter to control the loading of an application's startup form. 當屬性設定為`True`，不會啟動啟動表單。When the property is set to `True`, the startup form does not start. 在此情況下，您的程式碼應該呼叫替代啟動程式碼路徑。In that case, your code should call an alternate startup code path. 您可以使用屬性`e`參數或屬性來存取應用程式的命令列引數。You can use the property of the `e` parameter or the property to access the application's command-line arguments. 程式碼`Startup`事件處理常式會儲存在 ApplicationEvents.vb 檔案中，預設為隱藏。The code for the `Startup` event handler is stored in the ApplicationEvents.vb file, which is hidden by default. | | |-| |若要存取的應用程式事件的程式碼編輯器視窗To access the Code Editor window for application events| |1.在選取的專案**方案總管] 中**，按一下 [**屬性**上**專案**功能表。1. With a project selected in **Solution Explorer**, click **Properties** on the **Project** menu.
2.按一下 [應用程式] 索引標籤。2. Click the **Application** tab.
3.按一下 [檢視應用程式事件] 按鈕以開啟 [程式碼編輯器]。3. Click the **View Application Events** button to open the Code Editor.

如需詳細資訊，請參閱[專案設計工具、應用程式頁 (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic)。For more information, see [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic).| ## 專案類型的可用性Availability by Project Type |專案類型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows Forms 應用程式Windows Forms Application|**是****Yes**| |類別庫Class Library|否No| |主控台應用程式Console Application|否No| |Windows Form 控制項程式庫Windows Forms Control Library|否No| |Web 控制項程式庫Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服務Windows Service|否No| |網站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 這個範例會使用`My.Application.SplashScreen`屬性和`My.Application.Startup`應用程式啟動時，更新啟動顯示畫面的狀態資訊的事件。This example uses the `My.Application.SplashScreen` property and the `My.Application.Startup` event to update the splash screen with status information as the application starts. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplication#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplication/VB/FakeMyEvents.vb#14)] 這個範例需要名為啟動顯示畫面必須專案`SplashScreen1`。This example requires that the project have a splash screen named `SplashScreen1`. 啟動顯示畫面必須具有名為屬性`Status`，更新其使用者介面。The splash screen needs to have property named `Status` that updates its user interface. 您必須在應用程式事件的程式碼編輯器 視窗中輸入程式碼。You must enter the code in the Code Editor window for application events. 若要存取此視窗，請遵循本主題的 < 備註 > 一節的指示。To access this window, follow the instructions from this topic's Remarks section. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[專案設計工具、應用程式頁 (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic)。For more information, see [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic).

summary.span: 發生於嘗試啟動單一執行個體應用程式且應用程式已於使用中時。

span.span: Occurs when attempting to start a single-instance application and the application is already active.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 單一執行個體的應用程式引發事件，當您嘗試重新啟動應用程式時已在使用中。A single-instance application raises the event when you attempt to restart the application when it is already active. 當單一執行個體的應用程式第一次啟動時，會引發事件。When a single-instance application starts for the first time, it raises the event. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . 此事件是在 Visual Basic 應用程式模型的一部分。This event is part of the Visual Basic Application model. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Visual Basic 應用程式模型概觀](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md)。For more information, see [Overview of the Visual Basic Application Model](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md). 與其他使用者介面事件的應用程式的主執行緒上，會引發這個事件。This event is raised on the application's main thread with the other user-interface events. 這可讓應用程式的使用者介面直接存取此事件處理常式。This allows the event handler to access directly the application's user interface. 不過，如果應用程式忙碌處理另一個使用者介面事件時都會引發這個事件，此事件無法處理直到完成其他事件處理常式，或呼叫方法。However, if the application is busy handling another user-interface event when this event is raised, this event cannot be processed until the other event handler finishes or calls the method. > [!NOTE] > `StartupNextInstance`只能在單一執行個體的應用程式中引發事件。The `StartupNextInstance` event is raised only in single-instance applications. 若要啟用您的應用程式的單一執行個體行為，您必須檢查**讓單一執行個體的應用程式**專案設計工具中的核取方塊。To enable single-instance behavior for your application, you must check the **Make single instance application** check box in the Project Designer. | | |-| |若要建立應用程式的單一執行個體To make an application single instance| |1.在選取的專案**方案總管] 中**，按一下 [**屬性**上**專案**功能表。1. With a project selected in **Solution Explorer**, click **Properties** on the **Project** menu.
2.按一下 [應用程式] 索引標籤。2. Click the **Application** tab.
3.選取**讓單一執行個體的應用程式**核取方塊。3. Select the **Make single instance application** check box.| 您必須使用屬性`e`參數來存取後續嘗試啟動單一執行個體的應用程式的引數。You must use the property of the `e` parameter to access the arguments for subsequent attempts to start a single-instance application. 屬性會提供用來啟動單一執行個體的應用程式的第一個執行個體的引數。The property provides the arguments used to start the first instance of a single-instance application. 程式碼事件處理常式會儲存在 ApplicationEvents.vb 檔案中，預設為隱藏。The code for the event handler is stored in the ApplicationEvents.vb file, which is hidden by default. | | |-| |若要存取的應用程式事件的程式碼編輯器視窗To access the Code Editor window for application events| |1.在選取的專案**方案總管] 中**，按一下 [**屬性**上**專案**功能表。1. With a project selected in **Solution Explorer**, click **Properties** on the **Project** menu.
2.按一下 [應用程式] 索引標籤。2. Click the **Application** tab.
3.按一下 [檢視應用程式事件] 按鈕以開啟 [程式碼編輯器]。3. Click the **View Application Events** button to open the Code Editor.

如需詳細資訊，請參閱[專案設計工具、應用程式頁 (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic)。For more information, see [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic).| 下表列出包含工作的範例`My.Application.StartupNextInstance`事件。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Application.StartupNextInstance` event. |以To|請參閱See| |-|-| |檢查第一個應用程式執行個體的命令列引數Check the command-line arguments of the first application instance|| ## 專案類型的可用性Availability by Project Type |專案類型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows Forms 應用程式Windows Forms Application|[是]Yes| |類別庫Class Library|否No| |主控台應用程式Console Application|否No| |Windows Form 控制項程式庫Windows Forms Control Library|否No| |Web 控制項程式庫Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服務Windows Service|否No| |網站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 這個範例會使用`e`參數事件處理常式來檢查應用程式的命令列引數。This example uses the `e` parameter of the event handler to examine the application's command-line arguments. 如果引數以開頭找到`/input=`，該引數的其餘部分會顯示。If an argument is found that starts with `/input=`, the rest of that argument is displayed. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplication#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplication/VB/FakeMyEvents.vb#15)] 您必須在應用程式事件的程式碼編輯器 視窗中輸入程式碼。You must enter the code in the Code Editor window for application events. 若要存取此視窗，請遵循本主題的 < 備註 > 一節的指示。To access this window, follow the instructions from this topic's Remarks section. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[專案設計工具、應用程式頁 (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic)。For more information, see [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event UnhandledException As UnhandledExceptionEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於應用程式遇到未處理的例外狀況。

span.span: Occurs when the application encounters an unhandled exception.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 應用程式引發`UnhandledException`時遇到未處理的例外狀況的事件。An application raises the `UnhandledException` event when it encounters an unhandled exception. 此事件是在 Visual Basic 應用程式模型的一部分。This event is part of the Visual Basic Application model. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Visual Basic 應用程式模型概觀](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md)。For more information, see [Overview of the Visual Basic Application Model](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md). 您可以使用屬性`e`存取導致此事件的未處理例外狀況的參數。You can use the property of the `e` parameter to access the unhandled exception that caused this event. 您可以使用屬性`e`參數來控制是否在應用程式結束。You can use the property of the `e` parameter to control whether the application exits. 根據預設，是`True`。By default, is `True`. 因此，在應用程式結束後完成`UnhandledException`事件處理常式。Therefore, the application exits after completing the `UnhandledException` event handler. 您可以將值設定為`False`中`UnhandledException`事件處理常式，以保留應用程式執行，並讓它回到等候狀態。You can set the value to `False` in the `UnhandledException` event handler to keep the application running, and have it return to a waiting state. 程式碼`UnhandledException`事件處理常式會儲存在 ApplicationEvents.vb 檔案中，預設為隱藏。The code for the `UnhandledException` event handler is stored in the ApplicationEvents.vb file, which is hidden by default. | | |-| |若要存取的應用程式事件的程式碼編輯器視窗To access the Code Editor window for application events| |1.在選取的專案**方案總管] 中**，按一下 [**屬性**上**專案**功能表。1. With a project selected in **Solution Explorer**, click **Properties** on the **Project** menu.
2.按一下 [應用程式] 索引標籤。2. Click the **Application** tab.
3.按一下 [檢視應用程式事件] 按鈕以開啟 [程式碼編輯器]。3. Click the **View Application Events** button to open the Code Editor.| 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[專案設計工具、應用程式頁 (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic)。For more information, see [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic). > [!NOTE] > Visual Basic 編譯器可防止建立無法引發此事件，以啟用偵錯工具來處理未處理的例外狀況偵錯的應用程式。The Visual Basic compiler prevents applications that are built for debugging from raising this event, to enable a debugger to handle the unhandled exceptions. 這表示，如果您要測試您的應用程式藉由執行在 Visual Studio 整合式開發環境偵錯工具中，您`UnhandledException`將不會呼叫事件處理常式。This means that if you are testing your application by running it under the Visual Studio Integrated Development Environment debugger, your `UnhandledException` event handler will not be called. 如需建置應用程式進行偵錯的詳細資訊，請參閱[/debug (Visual Basic)](~/docs/visual-basic/reference/command-line-compiler/debug.md)。For more information about building applications for debugging, see [/debug (Visual Basic)](~/docs/visual-basic/reference/command-line-compiler/debug.md). ## 工作Tasks 下表列出包含工作的範例`My.Application.UnhandledException`事件。The following table lists examples of tasks that involve the `My.Application.UnhandledException` event. |以To|請參閱See| |-|-| |記錄未處理的例外狀況Log unhandled exceptions|[如何：記錄例外狀況How to: Log Exceptions](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/how-to-log-exceptions.md)| ## 專案類型的可用性Availability by Project Type |專案類型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows Forms 應用程式Windows Forms Application|**是****Yes**| |類別庫Class Library|否No| |主控台應用程式Console Application|否No| |Windows Form 控制項程式庫Windows Forms Control Library|否No| |Web 控制項程式庫Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服務Windows Service|否No| |網站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 這個範例會使用`My.Application.UnhandledException`事件來記錄任何未處理例外狀況。This example uses the `My.Application.UnhandledException` event to log any unhandled exceptions. 您必須在應用程式事件的程式碼編輯器 視窗中輸入程式碼。You must enter the code in the Code Editor window for application events. 若要存取此視窗，請遵循本主題的 < 備註 > 一節中找到的程序。To access this window, follow the procedure found in this topic's Remarks section. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[專案設計工具、應用程式頁 (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic)。For more information, see [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic). 因為`UnhandledException`偵錯工具附加至應用程式時，不會引發事件，您必須執行這個範例在 Visual Studio 整合式開發環境以外。Because the `UnhandledException` event is not raised when a debugger is attached to the application, you have to run this example outside the Visual Studio Integrated Development Environment. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplication#17](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplication/VB/FakeMyEvents.vb#17)]

protected: static property bool UseCompatibleTextRendering { bool get(); };

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，此屬性允許為應用程式的表單指定預設的文字轉譯引擎。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, this property allows a designer to specify the default text rendering engine for the application's forms.

value.span: ，表示應用程式應使用 [!INCLUDE[vbprvblong](~/includes/vbprvblong-md.md)] 的預設文字轉譯引擎。

span.span: A value of indicates that the application should use the default text rendering engine for [!INCLUDE[vbprvblong](~/includes/vbprvblong-md.md)].

value.span: 則指出應用程式使用 Visual Basic .NET 2002 和 Visual Basic .NET 2003 的文字轉譯引擎。

span.span: A value of indicates that the application should use the text rendering engine for Visual Basic .NET 2002 and Visual Basic .NET 2003.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 根據預設，這個屬性會傳回`False`表示轉譯引擎的 GDI 文字[!INCLUDE[vbprvblong](~/includes/vbprvblong-md.md)]用於應用程式的表單。By default, this property returns `False` to indicate that the GDI text rendering engine for [!INCLUDE[vbprvblong](~/includes/vbprvblong-md.md)] be used for the application's forms. 不過，您可以覆寫此屬性以傳回`True`並指定應用程式的表單使用 GDI + 文字轉譯引擎，使用 Visual Basic.NET 2002年和 Visual Basic.NET 2003年中。However, you can override this property to return `True` and specify that the application's forms use the GDI+ text rendering engine, which is used in Visual Basic .NET 2002 and Visual Basic .NET 2003. 這個屬性由呼叫建構函式。This property is called by the constructor. 覆寫方法的程式碼類別應該進入預設隱藏的 ApplicationEvents.vb 檔案。Code that overrides methods of the class should be entered in the ApplicationEvents.vb file, which is hidden by default. | | |-| |若要存取程式碼編輯器視窗，覆寫成員To access the Code Editor window for overriding members| |1.在選取的專案**方案總管] 中**，按一下 [**屬性**上**專案**功能表。1. With a project selected in **Solution Explorer**, click **Properties** on the **Project** menu.
2.按一下 [應用程式] 索引標籤。2. Click the **Application** tab.
3.按一下 [檢視應用程式事件] 按鈕以開啟 [程式碼編輯器]。3. Click the **View Application Events** button to open the Code Editor.

如需詳細資訊，請參閱[專案設計工具、應用程式頁 (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic)。For more information, see [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic).| ## Examples 此範例示範如何透過覆寫，設定為應用程式的預設轉譯引擎的 GDI + 文字轉譯引擎屬性。This example demonstrates how to set the GDI+ text rendering engine as the application's default rendering engine by overriding the property. ``` Protected Overloads Shared ReadOnly Property UseCompatibleTextRendering() As Boolean Get ' Use the GDI+ text rendering engine. Return True End Get End Property ``` 針對應用程式事件，您必須在程式碼編輯器 視窗中輸入此程式碼。You must enter this code in the Code Editor window for application events. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[專案設計工具、應用程式頁 (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic)。For more information, see [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic).
